translations: 风趣的；有风味的；热心的，有热情的

sentences.sentence: Zestful personality charms all who meet him!
sentences.translation: 有风味的个性迷住遇见他的所有！

sentences.sentence: Seeing his family after three months away was a zestful moment.
sentences.translation: 在离开三个月之后见到他的家人是很令人感到来劲的时刻。

sentences.sentence: Many see the rich world as old, debt-ridden and out of ideascompared with the young, zestful and high-saving emerging markets.
sentences.translation: 很多人认为富有国家是老化的，受困与债务的，并且才思枯竭的，相比于年轻的、热情的、高存款的新兴市场。
